name: MacroDepression
description:
Experience the fun of years of debilitating depression in only one minute!

The theme was to confine the game to one screen or make a Warioware-like game, so I went with the former.

For those interested in seeing more of my work, check my tumblr (frequent updates) and website (very infrequent):

http://fffbbb.tumblr.com/

http://ektomarch.com/
